title: Neovim
image_desc: several panes of my neovim config
short: I wanted to use Neovim and I didn't want to use a distro.
long: In my mind this is less impressive and more just showing what kind of programmer I am. There are plenty of great programs I can install that give me a fully featured environment to write code and I can even use Vim keybindings, but I still choose to spend hours upon hours configuring neovim. But when I'm working in an environment that I built I am a lot more comfortable and aware of the features.
